basicInfo.name: Kyrielle
basicInfo.flavor: On the day the curse of destruction was cast, the hunter that raised Kyrielle died trying to save her. She joined the Luminous Revolutionaries to destroy all of the monsters.

Normal Attack.desc:
Single Enemy
 - Deals damage equal to 100% of Magic Attack 1 time(s).
 - 35% chance to inflict Paralysis. [Duration: 1 Turn(s)]
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Damage: To 120% of Magic Attack.
 - Adds Effect: 35% chance to inflict Paralysis. [Duration: 1 Turn(s)]

Skill 1.name: Regulus
Skill 1.desc:
Self
 - Grants All Debuff Removal.
 - Grants 1 stack(s) of Damage Boost for each debuff removed. [Max 4 Stack(s)]
 - Single Enemy
 - Deals damage equal to 220% of Magic Attack 2 time(s).
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Damage: To 267% of Magic Attack.
超越2段階達成効果
 - Single Enemy
 - Adds Effect: Activates again with 100% power upon defeating an enemy with damage from this skill.

Skill 2.name: Meteor Shower
Skill 2.desc:
All Enemies
 - Deals Piercing damage equal to 57% of Magic Attack 2 time(s).
 - Each attack has a 30% chance to inflict Paralysis. [Duration: 2 Turn(s)]
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Damage: To 67% of Magic Attack.
 - Increases Chance: Paralysis chance becomes 35%.

Passive.name: Festival of Stars
Passive.desc:
Self
 - Grants All Damage Nullification. [Ends After: Taking 3 Hit(s)]
 - Grants Guts. [Once per Battle]
 - Grants a Barrier equal to 135% of the caster's Magic Attack upon triggering Guts. [Duration: 3 Turn(s)]
 - Grants Speed-Based Attack Boost. [Always Active]
 - All Allies
 - Grants Magic Damage Boost. [Always Active]
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Effect: Speed-Based Attack max increases to 1320.
 - Increases Effect: Magic Damage Boost to 20%.
超越6段階達成効果
 - Increases Effect: Barrier absorption becomes 155% of Magic Attack.
 - Self
 - Adds Effect: Crowd Control Immunity. [Duration: 3 Turn(s)]

transcendence.transcend_7: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.

transcendence.transcend_11: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_12: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.

profile.likes: Elysia, Ryan, hunting, friendliness, steak, walks, wild animals
profile.dislikes: Nobility, the king, reptiles, cold food
profile.story: On the day the curse of destruction was cast, the hunter that raised Kyrielle died trying to save her. She joined the Luminous Revolutionaries to destroy all of the monsters.

basicInfo.name: Kyrielle
basicInfo.flavor: A hunter saved Kyrielle's life when she went missing during her training, and she learned how to use a bow and arrow.

Normal Attack.desc:
Single Enemy
 - Deals damage equal to 90% of Magic Attack 1 time(s).
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Damage: To 90% of Physical Attack.

Skill 1.name: Regulus

Self
 - Grants All Debuff Removal.
 - Grants 1 stack(s) of Damage Boost for each debuff removed. [Max 4 Stack(s)]
 - Single Enemy
 - Deals damage equal to 200% of Magic Attack 2 time(s).

Skill 2.name: Meteor Shower
Skill 2.desc:
All Enemies
 - Deals Piercing damage equal to 52% of Magic Attack 2 time(s).
 - Each attack has a 30% chance to inflict Paralysis. [Duration: 2 Turn(s)]
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Damage: To 52% of Physical Attack.

Passive.name: Festival of Stars
Passive.desc:
Self
 - Grants All Damage Nullification. [Ends After: Taking 3 Hit(s)]
 - Grants Guts. [Once per Battle]
 - Grants a Barrier equal to 122% of the caster's Magic Attack upon triggering Guts. [Duration: 3 Turn(s)]
 - Grants Speed-Based Attack Boost. [Always Active]

basicInfo.name: Kyrielle
basicInfo.flavor: Kyrielle went missing as a young girl while undergoing rigorous assassination training. She was thought to be dead when even the Shadow Clan couldn't find her.

Normal Attack.desc:
Single Enemy
 - Deals damage equal to 80% of Magic Attack 1 time(s).
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Damage: To 80% of Physical Attack.

Self

 - Single Enemy
 - Deals damage equal to 180% of Magic Attack 2 time(s).

All Enemies

 - Each attack has a 20% chance to inflict Paralysis. [Duration: 2 Turn(s)]
